pullrequest.title: Disable tests compilation by default. New 'make tests' target.

content.raw: I was talking to @dirk-thomas about this pull request earlier and he had some good points about standard cmake practices which might be a bit different from what we're doing here. Maybe he can pitch in here?
content.html: I was talking to @dirk-thomas about this pull request earlier and he had some good points about standard cmake practices which might be a bit different from what we're doing here. Maybe he can pitch in here?
